description: Claude CMS Index - Read this file FIRST to understand site content

instructions.addBlogPost: 1. Create new .md file in _content/posts/ with format: {id}-{slug}.md, 2. Add entry to manifest.json blog.posts array (at TOP), 3. Run: node _claude/sync.js
instructions.addWallItem: 1. Edit _content/wall/wall.json, add item at TOP of array, 2. Run: node _claude/sync.js
